attributes.action: CUT EMA, HELP COLLEGE STUDENTS FIND A JOB!
attributes.additional_details:
The Goverment have dropped EMA so why not help college students into Jobs?? If you get someone in a job when there young and they stick at it you will save money and maybe less people on Job's Seakers Allowence when there older. Cut EMA you have to bring in something new.

We Need Help getting a Job because I have tryed so Many Times and got no where, I am here for the other young people's voices aswell who want to go to college but need a job. By getting a Job that shows we are commited and gains Students Money for College!
